title: Tried and True
desc:
Post 370
- Players who draw cards due to this card's <:impact:1106704414225485894> effect also have the next special effect of a card they play reduced by 50% and rounded down.
- For each turn this card is in your hand and you don't play it, all numbers in its rules text are increased by 10%, as is its <:impact:1106704414225485894> value (it's 5). Maximum of 100%.
- If you're the runner-up and you've played this card, instead you also get the winner role.
